attributes.action: ORDER THE POLICE to invoice the false accusers of Jimmy Tarbuck for the costs of the investigations they caused.
attributes.additional_details: It is NOT right that criminals can make accusations, be proved to be falsely malicious and then have no consequences.  The taxpayer is already picking up the tab for the criminal activity of all taxpayer funded employees, and world terrorism through the Foreign Aid Budget, and we simply cannot afford to pick up the tab for every John and Mary who try to make a few bob by claiming abuse and jumping on the bandwagon which is Op Yewtree.
